document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Had </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4ffd4">presumed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">hope </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">loss </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">had </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">been </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Me </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Value </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">Greatness' </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7078ff">Sake </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">As </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff6c8e">Giants </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">gone </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">away </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Had </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4ffd4">presumed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">gain </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4ffd4">Favor </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4ffd4">remote </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">Failure </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">but </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">confirm </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">Grace </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">further </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9064a8">Infinite </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'Tis </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">failure </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">Hope </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">Confident </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">Despair </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">Advancing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">on </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">Celestial </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">Lists </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">With </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">faint </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">Terrestrial </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4ffd4">power </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'Tis </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4ffd4">Honor </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">though </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">die </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">For </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">no </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4ffd4">Man </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">obtain </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Till </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">He </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">justified </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">by </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">Death </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">This </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Second </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">Gain </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Had I presumed to hope
